text: The stars of Once Upon a Time have paid tribute to Georgina Callander – one of the victims of the Manchester terror attack – after meeting her just last month. Georgina was one of the 22 people killed in Monday night's bombing at Manchester Arena at Ariana Grande's concert. But she was also a superfan of ABC's fantasy fairy tale series. She went to a convention to meet the likes of Emilie de Ravin ( Belle ), Rebecca Mader ( Zelena ), and Lana Parrilla ( Regina ), and was incredibly excited, documenting her amazing time in a Twitter thread spanning more than 70 posts. OH MY GOS I LOVE HER SOO MUCH SHEES SOO PRECIOUS — gina today! ( @ emili
